businesses.description: Any business names associated with the Customer

url.description: Website associated with business. Start with http(s)://....

addresses.description: Must provide at least one Address

state.description: Two-digit state code. Ex: NY, CA

types.description: Array with one or both of: WORK, HOME

phones.description: Phone numbers associated with the Customer

types.description: Array with one or more of: WORK, HOME, CELL, FAX, BUSINESS

emails.description: Must provide at least one Email

types.description: Array with one or more of: WORK, HOME

comments.description: Can be used to provide additional context about this customer

reference.description: Used to attach your system's customer unique ID to this object. Up to 1024 characters long

debts.description: Any existing debts associated with the customer. Must provide at least one Debt

ssn.description: The Customer's Social Security Number. Should be formatted only as digits. (Ex: 123456789)

biller.description: For aggregators and marketplaces: this field stores the name of your sub merchant

product.description: Description of the product or service associated with this debt

initialPrincipal.description: Amount of money owed to you in cents

initialInterest.description: The amount of interest owed to you by this customer by the time it's handed off to TrueAccord

initialFees.description: The amount of fees owed to you by this customer due to not paying initialPrincipal

transactionId.description: You can use to store a reference to the transactionId on your system. Up to 1024 characters

transactionIp.description: IP address associated with this transaction. Either in IPv4 or IPv6 format

transactionTimestamp.description: Time that the transaction leading to the debt occurred, if applicable

defaultTimestamp.description: Time customer defaulted on the debt. This should be after the transactionTimestamp

accountOpenTimestamp.description: Time the customer initially opened or created an account with you, if applicable

clientFields.description: Key-value pairs that are client specific

key.description: The key specifying the type of information

sendCbrNegativeNotice.description: Flag indicating whether a negative notice WILL BE submitted to a credit bureau in the future

hasSentCbrNegativeNotice.description: Flag indicating whether a negative notice HAS BEEN submitted to a credit bureau in the past

postChargeOffInformation.description: Object with information relevant for Post-ChargeOff debts. Required for accounts in the state of NY

balanceAtChargeOff.description: The balance at time of charge-off

feesAccruedSinceChargeOff.description: The fees accrued since time of charge-off

interestAccruedSinceChargeOff.description: The interest accrued since time of charge-off

totalPaidSinceChargeOff.description: The total amount paid since time of charge-off

itemizationTimestamp.description: Unix Time in milliseconds, of the itemization date

initialPaymentsAndCredits.description: The monetary credits the customer has towards the debt, or the amount of money the customer has paid towards the debt, before the debt came to collections

isInitialPrincipalBeforePaymentsAndCredi.description: Flag indicating whether the initialPrincipal includes initialPaymentsAndCredits

creditorName.description: The name of the DOING_BUSINESS_AS creditor brand to associate with this debt

originalCreditorName.description: The name of the ORIGINAL creditor brand to associate with this debt

currency.description: Currency of Monetary Amount. Currently the system only supports USD

principal.description: The absolute value for the principal

interest.description: The absolute value for the interest. If not provided in request, default value is 0

fees.description: The absolute value for the fees. If not provided in request, default value is 0

costs.description: The absolute value for the costs. If not provided in request, default value is 0

notes.description: A note about why this balance has been updated

amount.description: The amount of the payment. Must be positive

payee.description: Identifies who received the payment: CREDITOR or TRUEACCORD

transactionReference.description: Reference to associate this payment to a transaction in your internal system

debtId.description: The debtId this application refers to

amountToPay.description: The principal amount that needs to be paid for completing this plan

discount.description: The discount offered as an absolute number

nextInstallment.description: Index of the next installment to be paid

fullyPaid.description: True if payment plan fully paid

email.description: Email address for contacting the attorney

requestedBy.description: REQUEST_BY_UNKNOWN, CUSTOMER, POWER_OF_ATTORNEY, CREDITOR, DEBT_CONSOLIDATOR, ATTORNEY, TRUEACCORD, ATTORNEY_DEBT_CONSOLIDATOR

debtConsolidatorType.description: Type of debt consolidator from predefined list

email.description: Email address for contacting the debt consolidator

merchant.description: Original merchant associated with the debt

activationStatus.description: ACTIVE, NOT_APPLIED, APPLICATION_UNDER_REVIEW, REJECTED, or OFFBOARDED

id.description: Unique identifier of the object in our system

isActive.description: Field which indicates whether an object is active in the system

isPrimary.description: Indicates whether that object has priority over others

state.description: Two-digit state code. Ex: NY, CA

phoneNumber.description: The phone number to be used for contacting

types.description: Array with one or more of: WORK, HOME, CELL, FAX, BUSINESS

type.description: CREDITOR when data is provided by creditor, CUSTOMER when the customer provides information directly to TrueAccord

errorCode.description: Error code about why data could not be ingested

reference.description: Refers to the reference field in the Customer data type

transactionId.description: Refers to the transactionId field in the Debt data type

Timestamp.description: Timestamps are in milliseconds since Jan 1st, 1970 UTC
